Title: Peter's Friends
Actors: Hugh Laurie, Kenneth Branagh, Stephen Fry, Alphonsia Emmanuel
Plot: Seven friends in an acting troupe graduate from Cambridge University in 1982 and go their separate ways. Ten years later, Peter inherits a large estate from his father, and invites the rest of the gang to spend New Year's holiday with him. Many changes have taken place in the lives of all the friends assembled, but Peter has a secret that will shock them all.
